prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Drums, Piano, Reed, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Drums, Piano, Reed - but no Bass - make up this song.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Drums, Piano, and Reed, but Bass is absent.

Style 3:
This composition features Guitar, Drums, Piano, and Reed, but Bass is not included.
